Posts.Content: hi all new to site, have breast cancer with HER2 postive receptors, have all the surgeries and radiation internal and started chemo which will be a year. tried to find support group here in AZ not easy task. want to say hi and wish everyone a good day today tomorrow and everyday
Posts.Title: surgery

Posts.Content: Â  On 6/12/2009 peggypraying wrote: I'm relatively new here, too but have found that this is the place to be for both information and compassion. I have never been let down when I've asked for help and I thank everyone who has taken the time to respond to my emails. So I wish good luck to you and happiness everyday. thank you for the response, I have tried other sites and found people to be very overbearing or no response at all
